Headline: Yellow Line Service Delayed near Dodge
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are standing near Dodge due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are standing near Dodge due to a mechanical problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus route #97 Skokie, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
